solution_line_template: She caught {trout_total_weight} pounds of catfish because {num_trout} x {trout_weight_per_fish} = <<{num_trout}*{trout_weight_per_fish}={trout_total_weight}>>{trout_total_weight}
She caught {catfish_total_weight} pounds of catfish because {num_catfish} x {catfish_weight_per_fish} = <<{num_catfish}*{catfish_weight_per_fish}={catfish_total_weight}>>{catfish_total_weight}
She caught {bluegill_stated_weight_text} pounds of bluegill because {num_bluegills} x {bluegill_weight_per_fish} = {bluegill_calculated_weight}

She caught {total_fish_stated_weight_text} pounds of fish because {trout_total_weight} + {catfish_total_weight} + {bluegill_calculated_weight} = <<{trout_total_weight}+{catfish_total_weight}+{bluegill_calculated_weight}={total_fish_calculated_weight}>>{total_fish_calculated_weight}
